title: Ep168 Toy Crimes
description: This week, the gals snuggle up and regress into childhood. Topics include soggy yet invaluable loveys, an inside job at a Toys R Us, and the bonkers history of Barbie. Drop a bottle of Passarola White Blend into your Winc cart, retrieve your transitional object from your adulthood bed (you know you still sleep with it), and tune in for Toy Crimes. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
